summary: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.
cast: Paul Freeman|Leo Dolan|Kevin McNally|Patti Love|P.H. Moriarty|Derek Thompson|Bryan Marshall|Bob Hoskins|Helen Mirren|Ruby Head|Charles Cork|Olivier Pierre|Pierce Brosnan|Daragh O'Malley|Dave King|Karl Howman|Brian Hall|Alan Ford|Dave Ould|Paul Kember|Bill Moody|Alan Devlin|Eddie Constantine|Stephen Davies|Bruce Alexander|Nigel Humphreys|Brian Hayes|Georgie Phillips|Mary Sheen|Pauline Melville|Trevor Laird|Paul Barber|Dexter Fletcher|Billy Cornelius|Michael Ryan|Robert Walker|Nick Stringer|Gillian Taylforth|Robert Hamilton|James Ottaway|Roy Alon|Tony Rohr|Tony Clarkin|George Coulouris|Harry Fielder|Jill Goldston|Ralph G. Morse|Alan Talbot
title: El largo viernes santo
